name: Retrode Utility
body:
### Welcome to Retrode Utility.
Retrode Utility is a handy program that allows you to edit your Retrode's configuration file and install new firmware versions without having to mess around with strange text editors or the command line.

### Screenshots
![Splash Screen](images/connect.png)

![Firmware Selection](images/firmware.png)

### Thanks
Retrode Utility uses the great DFU-Programmer which is available over at Sourceforge ([here](http://dfu-programmer.sourceforge.net)). Also @jerrykrinock's code on [NSString geomentrics](https://github.com/jerrykrinock/CategoriesObjC/tree/master/NS(Attributed\)String+Geometrics) saved me a lot of time.
tagline: A Retrode configuration utility for Mac OS X
